member.name: WRITE_CACHE_TYPE.WriteCacheTypeUnknown
member.summary: The system cannot report the type of the write cache.

member.name: WRITE_CACHE_TYPE.WriteCacheTypeNone
member.summary: The device does not have a write cache.

member.name: WRITE_CACHE_TYPE.WriteCacheTypeWriteBack
member.summary: The device has a write-back cache.

member.name: WRITE_CACHE_TYPE.WriteCacheTypeWriteThrough
member.summary: The device has a write-through cache.
